Player History
Signed as a free agent by San Diego on 4/3/1985 to a minor league deal...
Traded from San Diego to Toronto on 7/24/1985 (Going to SD: P Dave Wehrmeister, P Jim Clancy, 1B Steve Garvey, 2B Luis Sojo. Going to TOR: P Mark Thurmond, 2B Jerry Royster, 3B German Rivera)...
Traded from Toronto to Atlanta on 6/16/1987 (Going to ATL: 3B German Rivera. Going to TOR: P Bruce Sutter)...
Had first career hit on 6/25/1987, off Mark Davis (MON)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/12/1987, off Drew Hall (CHC)...
Injured on 9/30/1988 with a Inflamed Achilles Tendon, out for 1-2 weeks...
2/2/1989: Gets a new one-year contract worth $350,000 through salary arbitration...
2/2/1990: Gets a new one-year contract worth $978,571 through salary arbitration...
2/2/1991: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,028,571 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 6/7/1991 with a Pulled Hip Muscle, out for 6 days...
2/2/1992: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,028,571 through salary arbitration...
2/2/1993: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,028,571 through salary arbitration...
